blogPost.excerpt:
No. 1 UConn plays No. 2 Baylor in the Elite Eight of the 2021 NCAA Women's Basketball Tournament.

The Huskies used a giant second-half rally to come back and take down the Lady Bears 69-67. A 19-0 UConn run was the difference, which came after Baylor senior guard Didi Richards left the game with a left leg injury in the third quarter.

The Bears nearly mounted a comeback of their own, falling just short in the final moments as the Huskies held on to advance to their 13th Final Four in a row.

Subscribe to the NCAA Championship YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/NCAAChampionships?sub_confirmation=1
blogPost.body:
No. 1 UConn plays No. 2 Baylor in the Elite Eight of the 2021 NCAA Women's Basketball Tournament.

The Huskies used a giant second-half rally to come back and take down the Lady Bears 69-67. A 19-0 UConn run was the difference, which came after Baylor senior guard Didi Richards left the game with a left leg injury in the third quarter.

The Bears nearly mounted a comeback of their own, falling just short in the final moments as the Huskies held on to advance to their 13th Final Four in a row.

Subscribe to the NCAA Championship YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/NCAAChampionships?sub_confirmation=1
blogPost.title: UConn vs. Baylor - Elite Eight Women's NCAA Tournament Extended Highlights
blogPost.author: NCAA Championships

localize.title: UConn vs. Baylor - 八强赛女子NCAA锦标赛延伸精彩片段
localize.description:
在2021年NCAA女篮锦标赛八强赛中，排名第一的康州大学对阵排名第二的贝勒大学。

哈斯基队利用下半场的巨大反击，以69-67拿下熊女士。一波19-0的攻势成为差异，这是在第三节贝勒大将迪迪-理查兹因左腿受伤离场之后。

熊队差点发动自己的反击，最后时刻只差一点，哈斯基队连续第13次挺进四强。

订阅NCAA锦标赛YouTube频道：https://www.youtube.com/NCAAChampionships?sub_confirmation=1。

localize.title: UConn vs. Baylor - 八強賽女子NCAA錦標賽延伸精彩片段
localize.description:
在2021年NCAA女籃錦標賽八強賽中，排名第一的康州大學對陣排名第二的貝勒大學。

哈斯基隊利用下半場的巨大反擊，以69-67拿下熊女士。一波19-0的攻勢成爲差異，這是在第三節貝勒大將迪迪-理查茲因左腿受傷離場之後。

熊隊差點發動自己的反擊，最後時刻只差一點，哈斯基隊連續第13次挺進四強。

訂閱NCAA錦標賽YouTube頻道：https://www.youtube.com/NCAAChampionships?sub_confirmation=1。

previous.excerpt:
Jason Statham and director Guy Ritchie are back in action. Watch the WRATH OF MAN trailer now and see it in theaters on MAY 7. 

A mysterious and wild-eyed new cash truck security guard (Jason Statham) surprises his coworkers during a heist in which he unexpectedly unleashes precision skills. The crew is left wondering who he is and where he came from. Soon, the marksman’s ultimate motive becomes clear as he takes dramatic and irrevocable steps to settle a score.

Directed by: Guy Ritchie 
Screenplay by: Guy Ritchie and Ivan Atkinson and Marn Davies
Cast: Jason Statham, Holt McCallany, Jeffrey Donovan, Josh Hartnett, Laz Alonzo, Raúl Castillo, Deobia Oparei with Eddie Marsan and Scott Eastwood
Rated R for strong violence throughout, persuasive language, and some sexual references

next.excerpt:
As early as Tuesday, March 30, the SpaceX team will attempt a high-altitude flight test of Starship serial number 11 (SN11) – our fourth high-altitude flight test of a Starship prototype from Starbase in Texas. Similar to previous high-altitude flight tests of Starship, SN11 will be powered through ascent by three Raptor engines, each shutting down in sequence prior to the vehicle reaching apogee – approximately 10 km in altitude. SN11 will perform a propellant transition to the internal header tanks, which hold landing propellant, before reorienting itself for reentry and a controlled aerodynamic descent.
  
The Starship prototype will descend under active aerodynamic control, accomplished by independent movement of two forward and two aft flaps on the vehicle. All four flaps are actuated by an onboard flight computer to control Starship’s attitude during flight and enable precise landing at the intended location. SN11’s Raptor engines will then reignite as the vehicle attempts a landing flip maneuver immediately before touching down on the landing pad adjacent to the launch mount. 

A controlled aerodynamic descent with body flaps and vertical landing capability, combined with in-space refilling, are critical to landing Starship at destinations across the solar system where prepared surfaces or runways do not exist, and returning to Earth. This capability will enable a fully reusable transportation system designed to carry both crew and cargo on long-duration, interplanetary flights and help humanity return to the Moon, and travel to Mars and beyond.  

Given the dynamic schedule of development testing, stay tuned to our social media channels for updates as we move toward SpaceX’s fourth high-altitude flight test of Starship!
next.title: Starship | SN11 | High-Altitude Flight Test

localize.title: 星际飞船｜SN11｜高空飞行试验
localize.description:
早在3月30日周二，SpaceX团队就将尝试对星际飞船序列号11（SN11）进行高空飞行试验--这是我们在德克萨斯州星际基地对星际飞船原型进行的第四次高空飞行试验。与之前的 "星舰 "高空飞行试验类似，SN11将由三台 "猛禽 "发动机提供动力完成上升，每台发动机在飞行器到达远地点--约10公里高度之前依次关闭。SN11将进行推进剂过渡到内部的头舱，头舱内存放着着陆推进剂，然后再调整方向，进行再入和受控的空气动力下降。
  
星舰原型机将在主动空气动力控制下下降，通过飞行器上的两个前襟翼和两个后襟翼的独立运动来完成。所有四片襟翼均由机载飞行计算机驱动，以控制 "星舰 "在飞行过程中的姿态，并实现在预定地点的精确降落。SN11的 "猛禽 "发动机将在飞行器尝试降落翻转动作时重新点火，然后立即降落在发射架附近的着陆台上。

受控的带体襟翼的气动下降和垂直着陆能力，加上空间内补给，对于将 "星际飞船 "降落到太阳系内不存在准备好的地面或跑道的目的地，并返回地球至关重要。这种能力将使一个完全可重复使用的运输系统成为可能，该系统旨在携带乘员和货物进行长时间的星际飞行，并帮助人类返回月球，并前往火星及其他地方。 

鉴于开发测试的动态时间表，请关注我们的社交媒体渠道，了解最新情况，我们将迎来SpaceX的第四次星际飞船高空飞行测试!

localize.title: 星際飛船｜SN11｜高空飛行試驗
localize.description:
早在3月30日週二，SpaceX團隊就將嘗試對星際飛船序列號11（SN11）進行高空飛行試驗--這是我們在德克薩斯州星際基地對星際飛船原型進行的第四次高空飛行試驗。與之前的 "星艦 "高空飛行試驗類似，SN11將由三臺 "猛禽 "發動機提供動力完成上升，每臺發動機在飛行器到達遠地點--約10公里高度之前依次關閉。SN11將進行推進劑過渡到內部的頭艙，頭艙內存放着着陸推進劑，然後再調整方向，進行再入和受控的空氣動力下降。
  
星艦原型機將在主動空氣動力控制下下降，通過飛行器上的兩個前襟翼和兩個後襟翼的獨立運動來完成。所有四片襟翼均由機載飛行計算機驅動，以控制 "星艦 "在飛行過程中的姿態，並實現在預定地點的精確降落。SN11的 "猛禽 "發動機將在飛行器嘗試降落翻轉動作時重新點火，然後立即降落在發射架附近的着陸臺上。

受控的帶體襟翼的氣動下降和垂直着陸能力，加上空間內補給，對於將 "星際飛船 "降落到太陽系內不存在準備好的地面或跑道的目的地，並返回地球至關重要。這種能力將使一個完全可重複使用的運輸系統成爲可能，該系統旨在攜帶乘員和貨物進行長時間的星際飛行，並幫助人類返回月球，並前往火星及其他地方。 

鑑於開發測試的動態時間表，請關注我們的社交媒體渠道，瞭解最新情況，我們將迎來SpaceX的第四次星際飛船高空飛行測試!
